metadata.title: CVE-2018-13794 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer overflow exists in stbi__bmp_load_cont in stb_image.h in catimg 2.4.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-13794` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

catimg - 2.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: catimg package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.0-1').
